alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 8:39PM EDT until August 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Hardin, Larue and Nelson. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elizabethtown, Bardstown, New Haven, Nelsonville, Boston, Bellwood, Lyons, Cravens, Blue Gap and Culvertown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
